content: an *italian spring shawlette* is a simple shallow triangular shawl featuring garter stitch and eyelets easy to knit easy to wear **yarn** 100 g of knitting for olive merino or cotton merino or pure silk 250 meters 273 yards / 50 g **measurements** width 170 cm 67 inch height 32 cm 13 inch **needles** 3 5 mm us 4 circular needles at least 100 cm 39 inch long **gauge** 19 sts and 44 row in 10 cm 4 inch in garter stitch **notes** * the shawlette is worked flat back and forth with a bottom-up construction from the tip at the lower end towards the cast-off edge at the top it features garter stitch and beautiful eyelets throughout * you can easily adjust the length based on the amount of yarn you have keep knitting until you have just enough yarn to work the cast-off edge or until you re happy with the size **samples in pictures** * gray version 100 g 2 balls of knitting for olive pure silk in the colorway 1015 kitt * green version 100 g 4 balls of campolmi filati cashmere in the colorway 13 army green * blue version 180 g 1 8 balls of regia silk in the colorway 53 blue
